Damage: 4D+1 '''Capsule''': The Kazellis light freighter was a speedy ship manufactured by the Kazellis Corporation. Due to the company's nationalization, these ships were rare. It came equipped with modest shields and a quad light laser cannon for defense. It was prized by smugglers and privateers who wanted a quick and comfortable ship that didn't need a lot of modifications to be useful.
